hero.title: LightBurn is layout, editing, and control software for your laser cutter.
hero.subtitle: LightBurn is a native application written for Windows Only.

features.title: Import Artwork
features.description: Import artwork in a variety of common vector graphic and image formats.

features.title: Edit & Create
features.description: Arrange, edit, and even create new vector shapes within LightBurn's powerful editor.

features.title: Apply Settings
features.description: Apply settings like power, speed, number of passes, cut order, brightness & contrast, dithering mode, and many more!

whyChoose.title: Why Choose
whyChoose.ready: Ready to take control of your laser?
benefits: The Best Laser Engraving Software – Trusted by thousands of users worldwide

items.question: How long does my license last?
items.answer: LightBurn will work forever as long as you have your license key, but after a year you will need to renew the maintenance on your license to keep getting the latest features and updates.

items.question: What operating systems does your software work with?
Is LightBurn Compatible with My Laser Machine?
items.answer: LightBurn supports: Ruida (CO2), GRBL (Diode and CO2 lasers), Smoothieboard, TopWisdom, EZCad2 & EZCad2-Lite (Galvo fiber, CO2, and UV). Not sure about compatibility? Download the free trial and test it directly with your machine.

items.question: Does LightBurn Work on Windows, Mac, and Linux?
items.answer: Yes! LightBurn is compatible with Windows only, allowing you to use it on your preferred operating system. Try it risk-free – Download the 30-day free trial and see how it works on your device!

items.question: Is LightBurn a Subscription or a One-Time Purchase?
items.answer: LightBurn is a One-Time Purchase – No Monthly Subscription! When you buy LightBurn, you get lifetime access with 12 months of free updates included.

items.question: What Happens After 12 Months? Do I Need to Pay Again?
items.answer: No, you do not need to pay again. After 12 months, you can continue using LightBurn indefinitely with the last version you received. If you want to receive new updates after the first year, you can renew your license at any time, but this is completely optional.

items.question: Can my whole team use the software?
items.answer: Yes, even commercial businesses can use the same Activation across their entire team without additional costs.

items.question: How do I buy the software?
items.answer: It's easy! Just add it to your cart, fill in your details, and you'll get your Download Link right after completing your purchase.

items.name: Sarah M.
items.text: The ordering process was easy, and my key arrived immediately after payment. LightBurn is very user-friendly and offers many features that make my work easier. Top service!

items.name: James R.
items.title: Perfect Laser Software – Easy to Install & Lifetime Access!
items.text: LightBurn is simply amazing! The installation was fast and effortless, and within minutes, I was ready to start engraving. The software is incredibly user-friendly, with powerful tools that make designing and controlling my laser easy.

items.name: Maria L.
items.title: Outstanding Laser Software
items.text: It's a one-time purchase with a lifetime license! No subscriptions, no hidden fees—just buy it once and use it forever. Plus, you get 12 months of free updates, and even after that, the software continues to work perfectly. LightBurn is fast, reliable, and works seamlessly with my laser.
